title: How would you react if....
body:
... your favorite champion showed up at your door and informed you that they were moving in.  Would you protest or allow it and if you did allow them in, how much would it disrupt your daily life?

For me, it'd be Karma showing up.  Besides the fact that my wife might get a little angry or suspicious that another woman wanted to live with us, I assume Karma would keep to herself or be a really mellow person to drink tea with and have a good conversation.

replies.body:
{{champion:222}}  What house?

Edit: I won best response, think I will have a {{item:2009}}  to celebrate.
This wins as best response.

YOU MEAN I'D GET TO LIVE WITH LUX?! 

TACTICAL DECISIONS FOR DAYS. 

Although, I'd be really scared she'd break some of my stuff with her lasers. >__>
Yeah, but when the power goes out she'd be very useful... maybe.

She'll toss her E...

Thanks, Lux, you'r the be---- *pop*. Welp, there goes my TV.

"AW HAHA HA HA. HOOOOOOOOOO"
"EEEEEEEEEEEEEEH HE HE. AWH HAAAAAAAAA"
Maybe I'll finally be able to get get laugh down. :3

Well dependent on how I'm feeling that week, we are looking at:

{{champion:36}} Umm.....pls no, I have pets T_T
{{champion:82}} Umm.....Saying yes OR no seems like a bad idea.....
{{champion:17}} TEACH ME TO BE SCOUT
MUNDO LIVES WHERE HE PLEASES
can you even say no to mundo? he might get a bit murdery on you

Why do i like such violent champions T_T the next few would be {{champion:14}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:8}} 

I'm just screwed, aren't I?
at least you don't like creepy ones {{champion:83}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:56}}
Shaco and Yorick are pretty cool actually...
...before shaco stabs you in the back as a "joke".
Thankfully, we have a spare girl's room, so Ahri showing up at my front door would be a pretty manageable situation.

But this:
http://fc02.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2013/358/3/a/ahri_puke_rainbow_animation_by_cissydella-d6z9964.gif
This reminds me: we need an Arcade Malzhar skin that pukes rainbows.
I feel like Xerath would be very low upkeep, so that would be nice...
And hey if you're power goes out all you have to is say "I bet you can't power my house for a day or two", and you'll be set.

http://raspbeary.tumblr.com/post/92172511090/what-a-heartbreaker

Pretty into it.

{{champion:90}} 

We can be beer buddies! ^^
Have fun cleaning up space puke.

{{champion:111}} might not fit through my door. Other than that hes a total goof who gets kinda dark sometimes. Sounds like a pretty normal room mate.

{{champion:50}} .... Would I even have a choice? I feel like I would have unknowingly signed the papers to sell my house to him before he even showed up.

{{champion:114}} I think I would be fine with... plus she's "an artist with a sword...in more ways than one" if you know what I'm saying.
Swain getting your house sounds like a "tactical acquirement."

This is also true
"Hey Swain, our neighbors sure are loud all the time"

"I'm five steps ahead of you"
Let's face it: 99% of the champions in this game are psychopaths that you wouldn't want living anywhere near you.
Oh *Hi Katarina, yes come in you can live with me for sure, in fact sleep in my bed pls*
So how's the couch?
{{champion:412}}  not with my wife around....
I assume I'd just have to water {{champion:143}} a few times a week and she'd be happy. PLUS If zombies ever did take over the world, I'd just hole up in my house and survive PvZ style :D
I would love to have {{champion:74}}  as a roommate. He'd be able to upgrade all my tech! I'd probably have to get him some step stools though.

"Ashe, this is the last time -- do ***NOT*** set the AC unit to 40°F!"

**EDIT:** Added clarity for Europe.

Well,Out my top two favorites.
 One would be  {{champion:103}}, Which I can't see being much of an issue. I don't think she would cause any trouble she wouldn't be able to solve herself,Would take care of herself pretty well,  and she seems quiet, and relatively reserved. So I think we would at very least get along . I would however, Likely have to stop talking with a number of my friends due the fact they would be unnecessarily  rude to her (Have to think about those you live with first.) , and I doubt she would like any of my neighbors. Overall, I'd think I be happy, unless she starts trying to kill me.

The other would be {{champion:31}}, Which if he could even fit in my apartment, Would likely be a huge problem.
We would likely tolerate each others presence, as I would stay out of his way as much as I can.  He would likely be very low maintenance, Which would be the only upside. He would be utterly incapable of tolerating my neighbors and I would likely wake up one night to the sound him smashing through the wall into my neighbors apartment to remove them from existence.
{{champion:91}} , no more enemies, or noisy neighbors
I already get freaked out by normal spiders in my house. I don't think I'd handle living with Elise very well.

*Ding dong.
Me: walks up to door and opens it 

{{champion:131}} : Hello i will be living here 
Me: Wat?
{{champion:131}} : I will be living here now 
Me:...........ok i am fine with this, may i ask why?
{{champion:131}} : well {{champion:89}}  moved next door and i like to keep tabs on her 
Me: Well then this is awesome
{{champion:131}} : oh if you don't believe in the moon i will skin you in your sleep  
Me: Thats not a problem 
{{champion:89}} : Hi i just moved next door an... oh hey Diana! what are you doing here 
{{champion:131}} : I live with this man is that a problem? 
{{champion:89}} : well that wont do to have two young adults living alone together unsupervised im moving in too.
{{champion:131}}:  You live with us? just try it!
{{champion:89}}:  Im moving in weather you like it or not
Me: .....................(if i keep quite i might just live)
{{champion:222}}:  This sounds like fun 
{{champion:103}}:Ya mind if we live here too 
{{champion:131}} Why the all the love of the moon are you two here??????
{{champion:222}}  You two are fun to watch, namely when ya fight but this is good too 
Me:( ..........i have a big house but ......not that i can refuse them.........) fine fine you call all live here
One day latter 
Me: You guys destroyed my house!!!!
{{champion:103}} : dont panic, dont panic I will just call victor, hes on speed dial on my phone, ill make him build us a new house, this is far to entertaining to let end 
{{champion:112}} : I got the call lets see whats up
Several minutes latter 
{{champion:112}} : Well ya got the destroy part now its time to improve!
Me: and thus my new daily life began

{{champion:37}} ............
me: what are you saying!
{{champion:37}} ........    ......... :)
me: .......how did you just make a happy face sound while speaking to me?


one week later

{{champion:37}} .........
me: wow i never knew that shiv was so riskay
{{champion:37}} ........... ........ ...... .....!   ....... ...... ..........?
me: sure sounds great

Oh this is hard. Ok
{{champion:266}} : Stop making me want to kill my dog. ENOUGH OF YOUR MADNESS! EVEN THE DOG KILLING ME!

{{champion:201}} : Would share a drink of Goat's Milk. And perhaps show him Heavy from TF2.

{{champion:9}} : If I see one more (TEEMO!) crow I am going to burn this house down with you in it!

{{champion:150}} : So cu... Where's my house? Oh yeah, he wanted a cup of joe and didn't know how to work it.

{{champion:74}} : Science puns for days

{{champion:30}} : (My Fav Champ) Hey Karthus can you press R for my noisy neighbors?

{{champion:61}} : So much Steam... Keep that ball away from me.

{{champion:37}} ... Wonderful Music.

{{champion:50}} : No more dammed birds in my house!

{{champion:412}} : No offence but I want my Soul

{{champion:4}} : Here's another dammed card.

{{champion:29}}: Well can you go to my other neighbor's house twitch?

{{champion:6}} : URGOT! CLEAN UP YOUR DAMN MESS

{{champion:112}} : I need a new Mechanical arm.

{{champion:8}}: Go ask Aatrox for some. I don't got any! well, for you.

{{champion:157}}: Wonderful today eh? Just don't go kill me here.

{{champion:115}}: Well there goes the rest of my house

And one for the ones I forgot

{{champion:161}}  Alright here's the tes-. Please type it on the com- OK CAN YOU STOP DISINTEGRATING EVERYTHING I OWN OK!
{{champion:143}}  PLANTS.  EVEYWHERE.  HELP ME.

{{champion:22}} ...My parents started teasing me. No, she's not my girlfriend. She's already married. Not me. But I have no idea why the leader of the Avarosans has moved in...
{{champion:37}} ...She talks directly into my mind. And it seems no-one but me can hear her. It's a bit creepy, but I will get used to it someday. And no, she's not my girlfriend... I mean, maybe...

Am I the only one that wants {{champion:92}} to move in?? I mean sure she'd be a bit depressing to talk to but we would have lots of fun on outdoor adventures roaming around the world!

{{champion:92}} is the best, and for parties she could wear her bunny outfit! WOOOO
{{champion:133}}  I feel like Quinn would be a little awkward at first, but a great friend once you got to know her. I just hope Valor wouldn't eat my dog ^^'
{{champion:111}} I'm gonna need a bigger house...
No. No no no no. I'm not going to let in undead Noxus "Pride" on mechanic legs, shouting on me about endless tortures.

{{champion:103}} wants to shack up with me???

Oh happy day.

{{champion:58}} Hmm well, knowing Renekton "showing up at my door" would probably mean I'd need to get a new door. I doubt he'll need me to cook, so that's a plus. Honestly I'd probably be fine, my noisy neighbors though.......ehhhhh, not so much.

Update: Since my old one kinda outdated now.

I think this is how it plays out.

*Knock Knock*

Me: Umm Hello?

{{champion:67}} Yes I am here to move in now!

Me: (Well there is a wall behind me and she has a cross bow) Right this way Vayne.

*Knock Knock*

Me: Vayne 2nd door on the right is the room you are taking. No not tha-. Oh never mind.
*opens door*

Me: Well, uh, Hello. Nice...... Um......  What ever that is.

{{champion:101}} Why Thank you. I am moving in!

Me: (Oh FFS well He can shoot me with lightning so Yeah he comes) Since you can kill me easily yo-

{{champion:80}} Summoner! I am here to Protect my living space!

Me: Damn it Pantheon. I don't have room for everyone in the League. But W.e You and Xerath are 1st door on the left. 

Me: (Man this is getting crowded)

*Bang Bang BOOM!*

Me: Uh, Where did this bear come from? 

{{champion:1}} Hehe, you smell like Burning! 

Me: What in the Hell, Why is my house on fire now? Annie WTF! you are like 8 and you are playing with fire?

{{champion:267}} Let me Help you!

Me: I take it you are both here for living? (MOTHER HUGGERS) Well you can sleep with Vayne, Annie. Nami, you can room in the Basement. 

*Takes a walk for 5 minutes*
*comes Back*

Me: Oh you have to be joking me..... VAYNE! Stop trying to play pin the fish to the wall, Annie stop setting Pantheon's helmet ablaze, Xerath.... well you can keep powering my house if you want. 

So it begins.
{{champion:90}} Man, I don't want to house the bringer of the end times. I mean, I suppose the voidlings could help out around the house, but then they frenzy and it's just bad news for everyone.
